channel.title: How do I change to the new item id's
channel.description: Ok, I have a server that is great, many people play it. Well, one day I log on and the item id's for silabsoft is changed. So where do I change the item id's... there has to be another place besides item.cfg because I have changed them in there... :l

item.title: How do I change to the new item id's
item.dc:creator: @gnarly1 gnarly
item.description:
@gnarly1 wrote:

well you where not typeing what you know about, lmao

Read full topic

lmao wtf are you talking about dennis LMAO

you dont know what your talking about

zombie here
the item ids changed and i made this with some friends

[center]DO NOT STEAL/LEEACH![/center]

NOT TRIMD:

14073,14076,14079,14082,14085,14088,14091,14094,14097,14100,14103,14106,14109,14112,14115,14118,14121,14124,14127,14130,14133,14136,14139

[hr]

ARMOR
SILAB GOD ARMORS All 3rd Age ALL Bandos All Armadyl

Add the folowing to your item.java in there spots like the legs go after teh public static int legs[] =
LEGS: 15347,15349,14504,14508,14511,
